    • continentConnectivityCheck

      public boolean continentConnectivityCheck(WargameMap p_map)
      Checks if all continents are connected sub-graphs or not
      Parameters:
      p_map - WargameMap object representing the game map
      Returns:
      true if all continents are connected sub-graph, else false indicating incorrect map

      Check if the same continent already exist
      Parameters:
      p_map - WargameMap object holding record of all the existing continents and countries
